sys_update_version.name: sys_transform_script_a437dd182f38a010cab4d5072799b6f4
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_script"><sys_transform_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><map display_value="Cisco FN Bulletin TM">026b8560db502010c81a7b82399619c3</map><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[(function runTransformScript(source, map, log, target /*undefined onStart*/ ) {

	try{
		var dao = new Cisco_DAOScript();
		var resultFnBulletins = dao.createReferences(target.field_notice_id, "field_notice_id", "fieldnoticeid", target.sys_id, "x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_field_notices", true,target.customer_id);

		var calculatedFieldValue = dao.calculateField("x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_field_notices","device_id","match_confidence=Vulnerable^field_notice_id=" + target.field_notice_id + "");
		target.vulnerable_devices_count = calculatedFieldValue;
		target.update();


		var calculatedFieldValue = dao.calculateField("x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_field_notices","device_id","match_confidence=Potentially Vulnerable^field_notice_id=" + target.field_notice_id + "");
		target.potentially_vulnerable_devices_count = calculatedFieldValue;
		target.update();


		var calculatedFieldValue = dao.calculateField("x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_field_notices","","match_confidence=Vulnerable^field_notice_id=" + target.field_notice_id + "");
		target.vulnerable_assets = calculatedFieldValue;
		target.update();


		var calculatedFieldValue = dao.calculateField("x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_field_notices","","match_confidence=Potentially Vulnerable^field_notice_id=" + target.field_notice_id + "");
		target.potentially_vulnerable_assets = calculatedFieldValue;
		target.update();


	}catch(e) {
		gs.info("on after resultFnBulletins:"+e);
	}
})(source, map, log, target);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_transform_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-11-26 11:17:38</sys_created_on><sys_id>a437dd182f38a010cab4d5072799b6f4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onAfter</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Cisco BCS Operational Insights" source="x_caci_cisco_bcs">56b8d9362f3310108956ea5ef699b62d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Cisco BCS Operational Insights">56b8d9362f3310108956ea5ef699b62d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_script_a437dd182f38a010cab4d5072799b6f4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-09-20 08:10:22</sys_updated_on><when>onAfter</when></sys_transform_script></record_update>
